description: Whether you're hitting the slopes or headed to the apres activities, their Chair Lift Mitten is ready for the ride. Everything you love about Merino wool is blended with nylon and durable recycled polyester to keep your hands warm and dry while you shred it season after season. Designed in a fun, winter-inspired pattern, it’s the perfect complement to your snow day ‘fit.
name: Chair Lift Mittens

specs.value: 55% Polyester, 30% Merino Wool, 15% Nylon - Exclusive of Decoration
